laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely fatty. Focal thickening of the sigmoid, with fatty stranding and localized air bubbles within the mesentery. Scattered small nodes are not enlarged by CT size criteria. No large amount of free intraperitoneal air. No drainable abscess or intra-abdominal free fluid. Scattered diverticulosis is noted throughout the descending colon.
2.0 mg/dL (within normal range, ref range: 1.6-2.6 mg/dL)
